title: Help with Usernames.
body:
Hey! I was wondering if someone could assist me with swapping names on my two accounts. I did read a board post about it but I didn't full comprehend what it was saying.

So Account A is my main account, and the account I want the name to be Transferred on. Account B has the username I want, and I don't play on it anymore. 

Account A is taking Account B's name, how much IP do I need to make the transaction and which account will I need the IP on? After that , do I submit a ticket or what? Thanks

replies.body: We can't change or swap accounts *Usernames* (the one you type to login on the client), but we could verify that you own both accounts and get the *Summoner Names* swapped in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
